title.narrative: Towards haricot beans addition and boosting the haricot beans production and marketing activity

description.narrative:
BHAG: To be the number 1 organic haricot beans producer, processor and exporter in Ethiopia Ras Gayint Farmers Multipurpose Cooperative has been established in 2005 with 21 founder primary cooperatives found in 3 districts of South Gondar administrative zone and with a less than 200 thousand Ethiopian Birr(ETB). From time to time through the support of Agriterra the union is brining drastical development in its business operations and service delivery to member farmers. The union is one of the best performing client from the Agriterra Ethiopia client folio list. Currently, the union has 36-member primary cooperatives with 59,601-member farmers and 22 million ETB capital and being providing services like inputs supply, credit provision, industrial goods supply, agricultural products supply from other areas, grain marketing, sheep marketing and export marketing as well to the affiliated cooperative and to the community in general in its operation area. From year to year both the output marketing volume and the union capital is increasing. To improve and speed up its performance, Agriterra is playing a pivotal role, it has been taken good initiatives like a five-year strategic plan developed ,the relationship between the union, the cooperatives and farmers improved, value chain development activities on haricot bean and malt barley properly done and production boosted, market linkage created with buyers in Turkey, Great Britain, France, Belgium, India and Italy. Furthermore, the union manpower strengthened, the union built reputation and good relationship with financial institutions. However, the operations system and structure of the union remain without any amendments, which result limited business diversification and additional growth. As an example, in the union working area 50,000 tone haricot bean is produced but the union market share in comparison to its potential is still low and value addition also need to maximize its product values. Thus, this year we will exert more efforts towards assisting the union to inter in ago processing activity, improving the union performance by increasing its manpower especially by hiring key staffs, gaining competitive advantage by certifying its haricot bean production method and improving the union governance practice
Cascading the five-year strategic plan to each department and strengthening the union HR for proper execution of the strategic plan Establishing 1 pluses cleaning factory and conducting a feasibility study on animal feed processing plant establishment.Boosting the haricot beans production by 5% by engaging in seed multiplication activityGaining organic certification for haricot beans
This year we will exert more efforts towards assisting the union to inter in ago processing activity, improving the union performance by increasing its manpower especially by hiring key staffs, gaining competitive advantage by certifying its haricot bean production method and improving the union governance practice.
